intro_action: {period_past}, you finally understood what the scribbles of text on one page of The Black Cat Grimoire meant. It mentioned great power from one of the twelve gods.
chosen_god: 'If you wish for strength, seek Abend Diabolos Pwuhn, for he is the Unyielding Forge.'

development.id_1: The writings were clear; you must resurrect the first servant of {god_name} and accept his pact to achieve what you desire.
development.id_2: Only through the ancient rites can the servant of {god_name} be awakened. The price of power is never without sacrifice.
development.id_3: An offering must be made at the altar of {god_name}. The echoes of forgotten prayers will guide you.
development.id_4: The ritual requires a vessel worthy of {god_name}'s essence. Without it, the pact cannot be sealed.
development.id_5: To prove your devotion, you must walk the path of trials set by {god_name}. Only then will the first servant rise.
development.id_6: The stars align, signaling the time to act. Call upon {god_name}'s first servant, and he shall answer.

rising_action.id_1: Your choice has been made. With {item} in hand, you start organizing the altar of the first servant just as you read. You perform the ritual as the Grimoire described: {ritual_action}
rising_action.id_2: The sacrifice is inevitable. The ritual demands a price, one that cannot be undone. With steady hands, you prepare the offering at the altar: {ritual_action}
rising_action.id_3: An offering must be given. You kneel before the altar, whispering the sacred prayers, feeling an unseen force listening to your devotion: {ritual_action}
rising_action.id_4: The air grows heavy as you complete the final preparations. The sigils glow faintly, you proceed with the ritual: {ritual_action}
rising_action.id_5: To call upon the first servant, you must abandon fear. With a deep breath, you invoke the name that has long been forgotten, performing the ritual: {ritual_action}
rising_action.id_6: The moment has come. With {item} clutched tightly, you step forward to the altar, your voice steady as you begin the ritual: {ritual_action}.
rising_action.id_7: Unknown words echo in your mind as you prepare the altar. The weight of the ritual presses upon you, but you proceed without hesitation: {ritual_action}.
rising_action.id_8: The altar awaits, and the time is now. With {item} in hand, you channel your will into the ritual, each step precise and deliberate: {ritual_action}.
rising_action.id_9: The ancient words spill from your lips as you stand before the altar. The ritual demands focus, and you give it your all: {ritual_action}.
rising_action.id_10: The sigils on the altar pulse with energy as you begin. With {item} as your guide, you perform the ritual with unwavering determination: {ritual_action}.
rising_action.id_11: The ritual is clear in your mind. You place {item} upon the altar, your hands trembling slightly as you begin the sacred act: {ritual_action}.
rising_action.id_12: The altar calls to you, and you answer. With {item} as your offering, you step into the unknown, performing the ritual: {ritual_action}.
